dataList.name: Festival of Wonders
dataList.desc:
Gain 1 [FestivalFever] every time this unit applies a positive buff to other allies with its Skill effects (once per type of buff)

Turn Start: gain [FestivalFever] equal to the number of other allies (max 3)
Turn End: heal SP equal to [FestivalFever] on self (does not activate at -45 SP)

Turn End: at 10+ [FestivalFever], use a powerful Skill next turn (however, if 'The Parade Repeats for Eternity' is active, this effect does not activate)

dataList.name: The Parade's Lady
dataList.desc:
Turn Start: gain 8 [Protection]
- With every ally death, gain 1 less [Protection] at Turn Start
Turn End: If this unit did not take any HP damage this turn, gain 2 [Agility] next turn

dataList.name: The Parade Repeats for Eternity
dataList.desc: Turn End: if at 5+ [IncompleteParade], use a powerful Skill next turn

dataList.name: Parade of Happiness
dataList.desc:
Gains a new pattern when this unit's HP drops to 66% or less for the first time

Upon pattern change,
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 1
- Convert [BloomingThorns] on self to [BloomingThorns_2nd]
- All allies gain 3 [FestivalFever] and 3 [BloomingThorns] at every turn

dataList.name: Eternal Parade of Happiness
dataList.desc:
Gains a new pattern when this unit's HP drops to 33% or less for the first time

Upon pattern change,
- Raise Min & Max Speed values by 2
- Uses a powerful Skill; then weakens Resistances against Slash, Pierce, and Blunt (+0.5)
- Convert [BloomingThorns] and [BloomingThorns_2nd] on self to [BloomingThorns_3rd]
- All allies gain 5 [FestivalFever] and 5 [BloomingThorns] at every turn

dataList.name: This isn't how it ends
dataList.desc:
Turn End: If there are no surviving allies nor Backup allies, consume all [FestivalFever] and [IncompleteParade] next turn and become Staggered (activates immediately if there are no surviving allies at Turn Start)

In the turn after this unit is Staggered, summon 2 Kindred Bloodfiends

dataList.name: Bloodfeast
dataList.desc:
If this unit is on field, or is one of the units that can appear on this Stage, increase [BloodDinner] value by the amount of [Laceration] damage collectively received by every unit. 
When this unit enters the field, the sleeping blood drenching the battlefield will fill the surface.

dataList.name: Starved and Withered
dataList.desc: Gain [StarvingDolcineaOne] at the start of the Encounter

dataList.name: The Knight of the White Moon
dataList.desc:
Damage Taken -20%
Gain 3 [Enhancement] on Clash Lose

dataList.name: A Close Match
dataList.desc: At 10+ Clashes against the same enemy, randomly gain or lose Clash Power by (Clash Count / 10) in a Clash. (rounded down)
